channel.title: Pages on Develop, Build, Deploy - Repeat!
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Develop, Build, Deploy - Repeat!

item.title: About
item.description: The goal of Develop, Build, Deploy - Repeat! is to teach software developers and systems administrators how to build successful Continuous Delivery setups for software products - setups that are stable, maintainable, and adaptable. To achieve this goal, this project will regularly release educational material in the form of blog posts, tutorials, books, and video courses.
